org.jamwiki.parser.image

Class ImageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamwiki.parser.image.ImageUtil

  • public abstract class ImageUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for performing wiki-specific image tasks, such as generating HTML to display an image or building links to images.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MessageFormat DB_FILE_URL_FORMAT
      Pattern used in URLs for files uploaded to the database.

    • Field Detail

      • DB_FILE_URL_FORMAT

        public static final MessageFormat DB_FILE_URL_FORMAT
        Pattern used in URLs for files uploaded to the database. Pattern is URL root, file ID, version ID, resize increment, and file name.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageUtil

        public ImageUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • buildAbsoluteFile

        public static File buildAbsoluteFile(String relativeFile)
        Given a relative upload file name, return a File object representing the absolute file path for the upload file. Note that the file may not yet exist. If files are stored in the database rather than on the file system then this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        relativeFile - The file name and path relative to the file root.
        Returns:
        A File object representing the absolute file path for the upload file, or null if files are stored in the database rather than on the file system.

      • buildDatabaseRelativeUrl

        public static String buildDatabaseRelativeUrl(int fileId,
                                              Integer fileVersionId,
                                              Integer resized,
                                              String filename)
        Given a filename, generate the relative URL for files stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The WikiFile ID.
        fileVersionId - The file version ID, or null if building a link to the current version.
        resized - The resize dimension, or null if a non-resized image is being rendered.
        filename - The file name ("my_image.png");

      • buildImageFileUrl

        public static String buildImageFileUrl(String context,
                                       String virtualWiki,
                                       String topicName,
                                       boolean forceAbsoluteUrl)
                                throws DataAccessException
        Utility method for building the URL to an uploaded file (NOT the file's topic page). If the file does not exist then this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context root.
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the URL that is being created.
        topicName - The name of the file for which a link is being created.
        forceAbsoluteUrl - Set to true if the returned URL should always be absolute. By default an absolute URL will only be returned if the PROP_FILE_SERVER_URL property is not empty and differs from the PROP_SERVER_URL property.
        Returns:
        The URL to an uploaded file (not the file's topic page) or null if the file does not exist.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving file info.

      • buildImageUrl

        public static String buildImageUrl(String context,
                                   String filename,
                                   boolean forceAbsoluteUrl)
        Utility method for building the URL to an uploaded file (NOT the file's topic page). If the file does not exist then this method will return null.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context root.
        filename - The relative path of the file. See WikiFile.getUrl().
        forceAbsoluteUrl - Set to true if the returned URL should always be absolute. By default an absolute URL will only be returned if the PROP_FILE_SERVER_URL property is not empty and differs from the PROP_SERVER_URL property.
        Returns:
        The URL to an uploaded file (not the file's topic page) or null if the file does not exist.

      • buildImageLinkHtml

        public static String buildImageLinkHtml(String context,
                                        String linkVirtualWiki,
                                        String topicName,
                                        ImageMetadata imageMetadata,
                                        String style,
                                        boolean escapeHtml,
                                        WikiFileVersion fileVersion)
                                 throws DataAccessException,
                                        IOException
        Utility method for building an anchor tag that links to an image page and includes the HTML image tag to display the image.
        Parameters:
        context - The servlet context for the link that is being created.
        linkVirtualWiki - The virtual wiki to use when looking up the image/file, and when linking to the image/file topic page.
        topicName - The name of the image for which a link is being created.
        imageMetadata - A container for the image display params, such as border, alignment, caption, etc.
        style - The CSS class to use with the img HTML tag. This value can be null or empty if no custom style is used.
        escapeHtml - Set to true if the caption should be HTML escaped. This value should be true in any case where the caption is not guaranteed to be free from potentially malicious HTML code.
        fileVersion - If building image HTML for anything other than the current file version then the version object must be provided, otherwise this parameter should be null.
        Returns:
        The full HTML required to display an image enclosed within an HTML anchor tag that links to the image topic page.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException - Thrown if any error occurs while retrieving image information.
        IOException - Thrown if any error occurs while reading image information.

      • generateFileUrl

        public static String generateFileUrl(String virtualWiki,
                                     String filename,
                                     Date date)
                              throws WikiException
        Given a filename, generate the URL to use to store the file on the filesystem.
        Throws:
        WikiException

      • generateFilePageName

        public static String generateFilePageName(String filename)
        Given an image file name, generate the appropriate page name for the image. Note that this is the page name and does NOT include the image namespace.

      • isFileTypeAllowed

        public static boolean isFileTypeAllowed(String filename)
        Utility method for determining if a file name corresponds to a file type that is allowed for this wiki instance.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name.
        Returns:
        true if the file type has not been blacklisted and is allowed for upload.

      • isImage

        public static boolean isImage(File file)
        Given a File object, determine if the file is an image or if it is some other type of file.
        Parameters:
        file - The File object for the file that is being examined.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the file is an image object.

      • isImage

        public static boolean isImage(int fileId)
        Given a object name, determine if the object is an image or if it is some other type of data.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The file identifier that is being examined.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the object is an image object.

      • sanitizeFilename

        public static String sanitizeFilename(String filename)
        Given a file name that might correspond to an absolute URL, strip any directories and convert spaces in the name to underscores.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name (path) to be sanitized.
        Returns:
        A sanitized version of the file name.

      • writeImageTopic

        public static Topic writeImageTopic(String virtualWiki,
                                    String pageName,
                                    String contents,
                                    WikiUser user,
                                    boolean isImage,
                                    String ipAddress)
                             throws DataAccessException,
                                    ParserException,
                                    WikiException
        Given appropriate parameters write the topic record that corresponds to a file object to the database.
        Parameters:
        virtualWiki - The virtual wiki for the record being written.
        pageName - The page name for the record being written. This value should NOT include a namespace as the namespace is implicitly assumed to be the FILE namespace.
        contents - The topic contents for the file record.
        user - The author of the topic record, or null if the author is anonymous.
        isImage - Flag indicating whether the topic is an image or just a file.
        ipAddress - The IP address of the topic record author.
        Returns:
        The Topic that is written for the image record.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException
        ParserException
        WikiException

      • writeWikiFile

        public static WikiFile writeWikiFile(Topic topic,
                                     WikiFileVersion wikiFileVersion,
                                     WikiUser user,
                                     String ipAddress,
                                     String filename,
                                     String url,
                                     String contentType,
                                     long fileSize,
                                     ImageData imageData)
                              throws DataAccessException,
                                     WikiException
        Add/Update a WikiFile record, and add a WikiFileVersion record.
        Parameters:
        topic - The Topic record corresponding to this WikiFile.
        wikiFileVersion - A skeleton WikiFileVersion record. Most of the values of this record will be populated from other parameters passed to this method, but fields such as uploadComment should be populated prior to calling this method.
        user - The user who is creating the file record, or null if the user creating the file record is anonymous.
        ipAddress - The IP address of the user creating the file record.
        filename - The path on the filesystem relative to the file upload root for the file version being created.
        url - The relative URL for the file version being created.
        contentType - The MIME type of the file version record being created. For example, "image/jpeg".
        fileSize - The size of the file version record in bytes.
        Returns:
        The new or updated WikiFile record.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException
        WikiException

      • isImagesOnFS

        public static boolean isImagesOnFS()
        Returns:
        true if images are stored on file system and false if in database.
